data.text:
@educateadvocate End Mask Mandates Schools are not to practice Restraint and Seclusion.
-CA Educ Code § 49005.8 (2020) (4) Use a behavioral restraint technique that restricts breathing @UprisingLa
@oneunionmom @elisha1022 @educateadvocate There's not a single random control study that shows KN95s make any difference either.  So, I would argue it's the same as doing nothing...so why do it?
@elisha1022 @educateadvocate I'm not specifying cloth, but even that is better than nothing. We're using disposable KN95 masks here.
@elisha1022 @educateadvocate It's the absolutely least we can do to protect their health and the health of others. What would we be teaching them in this moment if we didn't encourage this?
